title: Type - Ratio
description: Type representation of a ratio as two parts of a quotient, i.e. numerator and denominator numeric values

numerator.description: Numerator of the ratio, i.e. the ratio of A to B (A:B) can be expressed as a fraction (A/B), where A is the numerator

denominator.description: Denominator of the ratio, i.e. the ratio of A to B (A:B) can be expressed as a fraction (A/B), where B is the denominator
